thread.title: Britney Spears Fans, Look Away! Lifetime Releases Extended Trailer Of The Unauthorized Biopic Featuring 'Justin Timberlake' & 'Kevin Federline'
thread.title_full: Britney Spears Fans, Look Away! Lifetime Releases Extended Trailer Of The Unauthorized Biopic Featuring 'Justin Timberlake' & 'Kevin Federline'

author: Perez Hilton
title: Britney Spears Fans, Look Away! Lifetime Releases Extended Trailer Of The Unauthorized Biopic Featuring 'Justin Timberlake' & 'Kevin Federline'
text:
1/31/2017 5:07 PM ET | Filed under: TV News • Justin Timberlake • Britney Spears • Kevin Federline • GIFs 
So this movie is still happening… 
Lifetime has released an extended version of its original trailer for the Britney Spears biopic Britney Ever After . 
Related: Ashley Tisdale Covers Toxic 
The new, longer trailer offers a more in-depth look at the made-for-TV movie, which chronicles Britney's spectacular professional highs and unfortunate personal lows, including some of her most iconic performances and the infamous head-shaving incident. 
However, fans might be more interested in another, shorter clip (watch it HERE ) which features portrayals of Justin Timberlake and Kevin Federline by actors Nathan Keyes and Clayton Chitty , respectively. 
Like all previous Lifetime biopics, the casting is simply tragic. 
Watch the extended trailer (below)! 
The movie will premiere February 18. Celebrities Who Have Been Accused Of Cheating! 10 All-Time Best Will & Grace Moments! Zayn Malik's Hotness Knows No Bounds! Celebrity Sexual Fetishes! Golden Globes 2017: All The Red Carpet Pics! All The Women Drake Has 'Dated' View Pics »
